meanings.definition: Fall in small quantities of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The rain drops gently on the roof.
meanings.sent2: She drops the coin into the fountain for good luck.
meanings.sent3: The leaky faucet drops all night, keeping me awake.
meanings.sent4: Her smile drops like a raindrop falling from a leaf.
meanings.sent5: The drops of dew sparkle in the morning sunlight.

meanings.definition: A small round or pear-shaped portion of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed eye drops for her infection.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys the sweet drops of honey on his toast.
meanings.sent3: The drops of paint on the canvas create a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent4: The drops of rain on the window look like tears.
meanings.sent5: The drops of water on the leaves glisten in the sun.

meanings.definition: A small quantity of a liquid.
meanings.sent1: She added a few drops of vanilla extract to the batter.
meanings.sent2: The drops of lemon juice enhance the flavor of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The drops of oil in the pan sizzle as she cooks.
meanings.sent4: The drops of sweat on his forehead show his hard work.
meanings.sent5: The drops of rain create puddles on the sidewalk.

meanings.sent1: He carefully drops the medicine into the spoon.
meanings.sent2: She drops the petals one by one into the water.
meanings.sent3: The chef drops the batter onto the hot griddle.
meanings.sent4: The artist drops paint onto the canvas to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: She drops her keys into her purse before leaving.
